modName: Upgrade for Bandolier - Bags and Pouches
summary:
This is a retexture for Bandolier - Bags and Pouches
- Adds environmentmaps/cubemaps to the Vials
- Adds other environmentsmaps/cubemaps to the metal parts
- Adds transparency to the Vials
- Higher detail on leather
descriptionHtml:
This is a retexture for Bandolier - Bags and Pouches
Only the Vial part

- Adds environmentmaps/cubemaps to the Vials
- Adds other environmentsmaps/cubemaps to the metal parts
- Adds transparency to the Vials
- Higher detail on leather

Cubemaps don't just use light like specular, On/off, but with their 6 sides they create different reflections depending on the angle.
Which results in a more realistic reflection. This stuff looks better in motion, than in pictures.

Requirements: The original mod, download and endorse
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16438/?
Credits to Dragten

Recommondation: This mod for a nicer cubemap
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1197/?


Compatibility:
No problems

Performance:
Minimal impact, not even 1 frame.

[youtube][/youtube]
author: Pfuscher
